List of the Central Committee to deal with Hijacking and other Acts of Unlawful 
Interference with Civil Aviation Operations. 
 
Ref: 
List of the Central Committee circulated vide letter of even number dated  11.01.2005 
 
Sir, 
 
I am directed to forward herewith the revised list of the Central Committee to deal with 
hijacking and other acts of unlawful interference with civil aviation operations. 
 
2. 
Any change in the name of the Members/ Alternate Members, their telephone numbers, 
RAX etc. may kindly be intimated to this Bureau immediately. Members are requested to attend 
themselves and not to bring any aides with them. 
 
3. 
Group “A” are those members whose immediate presence in the Central Committee 
Control Room from the start of the emergency till the situation is normalized, is necessary. 
Group “B” members shall be informed of the emergency and requested to remain available on call 
so that they can be summoned to the Control Room as and when necessary. 
 
 
 
 
(M. T. Baig)
